name: Bogner Wessex
details:
OverdriveDelivering classic low gain growl to rich modern scorch, the Bogner Wessex overdrive pedal with its 100% analog circuit gets its extraordinary dimensional range from a custom transformer designed by legendary audio pioneer Mr. Rupert Neve. Whether you want to give your clean amp some muscle or juice up your vintage ampâ€™s gain, flick the tone-altering Enhance/Neutral switch to find your own dirty nirvana.
Features:
True bypass
Controls: level, gain, treble and bass
E/N switch:  Selects between normal and enhanced mode (extended bass and sweet highs)
Interactive Jewel light reacts to your playing dynamics
Rupert Neve Designs audio transformer
Jacks: input, output
9VDC power-connector, 50mA or more
Optional Studio Series:
Bubinga exotic hardwood top panel
Hand formed, - sanded, - layered and - finished
Look and feel of the vintage mixing consoles from the 60's
